title: The Musical Murder
overview: Dao Panprakai, a famous and perfect theatre actress, unexpectedly finds herself attending her own funeral. After discovering her boyfriend's affair with another man, she fakes a suicide to gain attention, only to accidentally die for real. Her friend Khunphol, an acting coach, doubts her death was intentional, leading Dao to try to communicate with him and uncover the truth behind her demise.
